name: C&C 34+WK
notes: Wing keel version of a model most often referred to as the 34/36. Launched in the spring of 1989, the 34/36 was available in three versions (+, XL and R).The "+" version is the club racer-cruiser. The "R" is the full-blown racing version with a deeper keel. Not long after came the XL version, meant to combine the "R" performance with a more cruising oriented interior.
